subject: Order number SSN5488
description_text:
My shifter has arrived without an 6+r plate or the cable for it. I am extremely disappointed with the service I have received due to the long delivery time and lack of information given about the status please send the products I am missing or give me a full refund.

Sent from Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>

conversations.body_text: Hi Kaleb Visram,       We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused. We will immediately arrange for a replacement to be sent to you. Here is the replacement link we have arranged for you:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047241254488
